text: Prompter The most life-changing daily habit you have probably never heard of. 107K "The Reverse Gratitude Journal Everyone always talks about the 'habits that changed their life' and is constantly looking for the one thing they can do that will lead them to where they want to go. Whether it will be meditation, cold showers, or morning walks. The list goes on. However, there is one simple, daily habit that I believe is the most transformative. And I haven't heard anyone speak about it. And it's this: Keep a list of every time you proved the voice in your head wrong and went against it. Every evening, review the day and write down three things you did that proved your inner voice wrong. It can be so simple, such as:" This creates two profound changes mentally. Firstly, you start to realize you're not the voice in your head, you're just the one who observes. Something that takes years of meditation to realize. Secondly, you start to realize the inner voice/critic in your head is just your limiting beliefs. And by doing this list every day, you start to look for ways to break these patterns and continuously try to prove them wrong, and as you do that, you have a direct correlation of achieving your goals and having a better life. Give it a go. The compounding effect is real.
